Tonkean is the OS for Business Operations, transforming operations teams from facilitators into Makers with an enterprise-grade, no-code process orchestration platform. By abstracting the technical knowledge required to automate, monitor, and manage mission-critical business processes, while still maintaining compliance and security, Tonkean enables enterprises to accelerate operational velocity at scale. Delivering no-code solutions at scale requires a bridge between business and IT to drive.business agility while still ensuring compliance and security. With Tonkean, business operations teams can compose their own business logic using reusable building blocks called “Enterprise Components”. These components are pre-approved and controlled by IT, enabling key capabilities like interacting with existing systems, coordinating with people, or leveraging advanced technologies like NLP & OCR. Tonkean allows operations teams to safely create solutions that work on top of their current tools and align with the way people actually like to work.

Enterprises like Google, EVERSANA, Instacart, Grubhub, Crypto.com, and more rely on Tonkean to optimize and align their operations across functions—including sales, marketing, customer support, legal, finance, and more. With Tonkean, enterprises can expand the pie of who can deliver software, making a world of Makers.

6.ABOUT:
Nomentia has a long history with its roots in the 1980s in Finland, the home of cash management. That might sound like a reach, but account statements with a creditor reference are actually a Finnish innovation. In the context of cash management, too many corporates still suffer from scattered, unharmonized, and inefficient treasury, cash and financial processes. These inefficiencies lead to challenges such as globally multi-billion problem of payment fraud, while trapped cash, and sibility, and weak cash forecasts lead to treasuries not having the cash in hand to manage daily operations and invest back in the business.

Nomentia, was born from the foundation of two leading cash management providers, Analyste and OpusCapita, who firmly believe in Nordic innovation and strong heritage of advanced financial processes. The tools of modern cash management were born in Finland. We take pride in offering the widest and wildest, and the most modern cash management portfolio in the market.

We find our passion in modernizing customers’ processes, showing our superior expertise, and providing them solutions and tools that are pleasant to work with to help reach their targets to harmonize, gain synergies, and boost productivity.

We provide best-of-breed solutions for liquidity management, corporate payments and automated bank account reconciliation.

In almost all businesses of significant size today, daily operations involve dealing with mountains of data. This data is often stored in many places and frequently has to be validated and transformed to make it useful, then reconciled again for safety. Often, these processes are manual and incredibly time consuming. Duco provides a cloud-native data automation platform that makes it easy to deal with disparate data, no matter how complex. Businesses using Duco empower their people to brin. data together, validate it and keep it clean, and build a more agile, data-driven business - without requiring a wholesale change of their architecture.

 

The Duco Platform is a cloud-native, self-service solution that empowers businesses to ingest, transform, reconcile and report on data from multiple sources in multiple formats with ease. Users can build processes in minutes or hours with our no-code functionality, compared to weeks or even months on legacy systems.

 

Machine learning, enhanced workflow and robust governance features enable firms to eliminate manual work around data, increasing business agility, reducing risk, simplifying compliance with regulation and dramatically improving efficiency.

 

Customers include global banks, investment managers, insurance firms and challenger Fintech companies, such as Societe Generale, ING, Man Group and BlockFi.

11.ABOUT:
Paydit is an online platform for collection companies, lenders, and banks that automates the entire debt resolution process, from payment plan negotiation to status tracking and reporting, enabling cost-efficient and regulatory-compliant alternatives to the traditional debt resolution process. With Paydit, you can adjust every key parameter of debt negotiation and settlement to fit your internal processes and business requirements. These parameters include the number of installmentptions, billing, and more. As a result, you make the entire workflow more stress-free and convenient.

The Variety of Debt Settlement Options

The consumer can choose how to repay the debt, depending on the rules you set and their own preferences.  

Pay in full — the consumer makes a one-time payment, settling the debt at once, or repays in installments.
Negotiate to pay less — Paydit offers payment plans through which the consumer can pay a percent from the debt. Alternatively, they can try to renegotiate the amount to pay if none of those is affordable.
Flexible payments — negotiate payment plans for a part of the past-due account or create your own plan that meets the consumer’s budget and schedule.

Secure Debt Settlement  

Besides the integrated payment processors, Paydit allows you to add other payment providers that you trust to guarantee secure payments to consumers.

Comprehensive analytics 

Assess performance and consumer activities on the go with our detailed reports.

Full compliance 

Finally, Paydit is about compliance. The automation algorithms facilitate settling debts while following FDCPA and TCPA. For example, our solution automates legal wording in letters to be sent to consumers, choosing the right time to make calls.   
To top it all off, Paydit is easily adjustable to local regulations, ensuring auditable consumer interaction.

11.ABOUT:
Align your production to network inventory requirements leveraging Noodle.ai’s proprietary XAI technology Improve product flow by using predictive signals to make near-term production priority trade-offs to assure a seamless flow of required products to your network Increase cash flow by driving revenue through improved order capture and reducing costs associated with inventory and expedites More effective team flow by centering the organization around predictive Value at Risk ng collaboration ability across planning teams.

Product Overview 

The Noodle.ai Production Flow product is built for enterprises that have challenges with supply/demand imbalances across their portfolio, specifically in flowing the right volume of the right product to the network. 

This imbalance materializes as missed fill rate targets and lost sales, which many times occurs alongside inventory overages. We have found that traditional or concurrent planning systems miss identifying these risks due to deviations between plans and execution. Production planners, who are many times several steps removed from network demand, can’t even see the problems coming, much less solve for them, ending up in weekly firefighting attempting to resolve problems as they occur.  

 
Our Production Flow product provides AI-driven predictive view of Value at Risk (VAR) due to network wide inventory-demand imbalances, tied to the near-term production plan. Alongside prescriptive recommendations, this enables production planners to make only high-value exceptions to the production plan to mitigate predicted lost sales or overage risks in the network. Production Flow also supports a collaborative risk resolution process between supply chain functions, by aligning to a single truth, VAR, to further improve organizational effectiveness and response.

RedLore RTLS is a real-time location and condition tracking solution for objects and people, aka a Real-Time Location System (RTLS). It renders traditional barcode and RFID-based processes “touchless” with the goal to increase industrial productivity. RedLore RTLS provides high accuracy (1.5ft or 50cm) indoor positioning without requiring any wired infrastructure. Typical applications include indoor & outdoor asset tracking, production process tracking, material flow tracking, ventory, condition monitoring, safety-tracking of people, equipment tracking & utilization, consignment stocking, vendor-managed inventory (VMI), and automatic (un)loading detection. 

Mostly used by manufacturers, distributors, and 3PLs, RedLore RTLS consists of (1) low-cost IoT tags attached to equipment, inventory, reusable packaging, and people, (2) cloud-based algorithms transform raw data into insights, (3) control tower dashboards with an API to integrate or sent to the customer’s IT system.

Nooxit Atlantis is a software that use machine learning and historic finance process data to - automate manual data entries - detect double payments - detect anomalies - correct manual errors. Atlantis integrates with standard finance processes, like the invoice to pay process. The software is plugged to the customers ERP system. Currently the solution implements four features: 1) Reversal avoidance Atlantis can help to prevent rework and process errors in the posting process.  every finance posting in real time and alerts accountants about possible errors that lead to reversals and suggest corrections. 


2) Anomaly detection

The software can help to prevent financial losses. It  detects unusual posting patterns and fraud in real-time. It detects postings with unusual or rare combinations of attribute values for example unusual combinations of general ledger accounts or user accounts, rarely used accounts, unusual booking times  etc. 


3) Accounting field suggestion

Atlantis can help to increase automation and standardization in the posting process of invoices without a purchase order. From the line item text, the supplier number and the amount the softwares AI derives suggestions for the remaining fields like G/L account, LZB number, cost centre, VAT code etc. This suggestions help to significantly reduce manual data input.

4) Avoid duplicate payments
The software helps to reduce duplicate payments. The software analyses paid invoices and alerts the accountant if a duplicate is detect. This allows to recover the financial loss.

Manage production loading more effectively with Graphical Scheduler. With Graphical Scheduler from Insight Works, you’ll easily visualize exactly what work is scheduled at each workstation enabling production managers and employees to view and manage production loading more effectively. Optimize Your Scheduling with Drag-and-Drop Graphical Scheduler is more than just visualization. Users can easily drag-and-drop an operation on a production order to a new work center and time. As ranged, associated operations will automatically update to reflect a new production schedule.

One-Click Access to Details

Getting the details of a particular operation is as easy as highlighting the operation. You’ll see the production order number, routing number, descriptions, and more. Drill-down directly from the scheduler into the Production Order for more detail or to make changes.

Easily View Associated Operations

Highlighting a single operation will automatically identify all related operations so users can easily get a complete picture — all within a single screen.

Quickly Find Operations with the Built-In Filter

Graphical Scheduler includes a built-in filter that enables users to quickly identify specific operations. For example, users can filter on keywords like “wheel” or filter on a production order number to display only related operations.

Use Color Coding to Identify the Status of Operations

Color coding rules can be easily configured making it easier to quickly identify the specific state of jobs. Rules are based on data within Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central. For example, if a job has passed its start time or date and as not begun, the job can be set to a specific color like red.

Distributed Order Management (DOM) systems have become critical to supply chain execution, notably in omnichannel fulfillment but in many additional applications as well. DOM can be used to automate, optimize and orchestrate order fulfillment processes, based on granular visibility to orders, inventory, service requirements, costs and constraints. Softeon provides a feature-rich DOM solutions that supports a number of use cases, both within omnichannel and beyond. In omnichannel for example, companies use Softeon DOM to enable new processes (such as order on-line, pick-up in store, or support for new consumer “points of interaction”) without changing existing systems. It is also used to determine optimal order sourcing across the network based on advanced rules for how to run the business.

But Softeon’s DOM solution provides a solution for many other scenarios, including centralized “order hub” functionality for manufacturers and wholesalers, managing client process requirements for 3PLs, optimizing the inbound flow of goods, and much more.

DOM delivers significant value for many companies on its own, but increasingly we see requirements for an integrated DOM-WMS solutions. Softeon is a market leader in joint DOM-WMS deployment.

7.ABOUT:
For most organizations dealing with large populations of contractors, the task of assuring contract compliance is daunting. There just aren’t enough people to properly control the workforce. Supervisors are stretched too thin and barely have time to initial the timesheets or approve an email. Approvals are given just so vendors can get paid. No time or upfront business processes exist to see if the terms of the contract are being followed. Time administrators and supervisors for bothnd contractor don't know if terms covering over-time, double-time, craft and skills matching, hourly rates and more are being followed. Lack of ability to enforce contract compliance is a second root cause of overpayment in manufacturing companies.
 

 Track automates contract compliance. It keeps an electronic version of the terms and conditions in the database and applies those to the hours captured during the shift. Exceptions are highlighted and not processed automatically until a supervisor reviews and approves them.
 

 Track enforces a best practice of allocating 100% of contract labor hours, regardless of whether the contract is T&M, Lump Sum, or Unit Rate. Allocating 100% of labor hours ensures that costs are not allocated twice and provides an excellent work history. The historical data of actual effort for specific projects becomes invaluable information when planning future works. It is easier to choose what type of contract to use for specific projects when there is a clear understanding of the actual effort required to complete the project.

See Savings
Purchase Orders that contain an error, result in costly reconciliation costs, as studies show it can cost as much as $60 plus to manually reconcile a Purchase Order with an error. Spend Analysis Dashboard

See how much your organization has spent this week, by either individual location or vendor; or report spending by product and product type or classification. Order Transaction Dashboard

All transactions are tracked and can be viewed by time frame, vendor, transaction type or by each individual electronic document. Built-in is an order exceptions dashboard that highlights problem transactions to be reconciled, saving expensive manual labor costs. Orders which contain price discrepancies between PO, POA, and Invoice trigger a notification to be verified to ensure bad data is not continually passed along.

Rebate Savings Dashboard

Displays all your product rebate savings from your entire vendor community. Through this view find savings from your top vendors to build better value relationships and savings. Search by vendor, category, or classification.

Price Change Impact Analysis

Get insight into the effect of changing product prices based on your organizational purchasing behavior. Understanding the effect of a price increase or re-negotiated contract, allows decision-makers to better understand the effect on supply chain costs.

IoT Management Platform: The IoT platform facilitates effortless connectivity, stnagement, and robust security for LoRaWAN IoT devices and data. 🌐 It presents a comprehensive dashboard equipped with intelligent widgets that highlight location-centric and asset-centric functionalities. 📊 By enabling real-time collection, monitoring, and analysis of data from diverse IoT devices, it empowers businesses to make data-driven decisions and enhance operational efficiency. 💪💼

Feedback & Survey Tools: Introducing QR code-based Feedback and Survey System with Location and Asset orientation! These innovative tools empower businesses to gather feedback from customers and employees, measure customer satisfaction, employee engagement, and obtain valuable insights for improvement. 📊🗺️🔍📝 #feedback #surveys #improvement

Asset Management: This involves managing the lifecycle and maintenance of physical assets. It helps businesses keep track of their assets, understand their condition, and make informed decisions about asset utilization, replacement, and ensuring optimal working condition throughout their lifespan. 📅✨💼

When these components are integrated with cloud and edge computing technologies, they offer several advantages:

Real-time Data Processing**: Edge computing enables data processing at the edge of the network, close to the source of the data. This reduces latency and allows for real-time decision making.

Scalability**: Cloud computing provides virtually unlimited storage and processing power, enabling the system to scale as per the business requirements.

Security**: Both edge and cloud computing offer robust security measures to protect sensitive data and IoT devices from cyber threats.

Cost Savings**: By reducing the need for extensive data transport and offering pay-as-you-go models, businesses can save significant costs.

The integration with Operational Technology (OT) further enhances the capabilities of the Infodeck solution. OT integration allows for seamless communication between the IoT devices and the management systems, enabling real-time monitoring and control of physical devices and industrial processes. This leads to improved efficiency, safety, and productivity in the operational environment.

In summary, the Infodeck solution provides a holistic, integrated approach to managing and optimizing business operations. It leverages advanced technologies to provide actionable insights, improve efficiency, and reduce costs.
